### Request for Proposal: Planetary Ball Mill

**Reference Number: WS4221476912-Doc4231712951**
**Amendment Number: 1**
**Publication Date: September 27, 2023**
**Tender Closing Date: October 13, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) at the request of Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) invites proposals from Offerors for the supply and delivery of a Planetary Ball Mill.

**Procurement Details:**

*   **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Key Requirements:**

*   Supply and delivery of a Planetary Ball Mill to ECCC in Burlington, Canada
*   ECCC is seeking the lowest-priced bid for the Planetary Ball Mill

**Contracting Entity:**

*   Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5

**Proponent Contact:**

*   David Barltrop (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Email: david.barltrop@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Additional Information:**

*   Details and eligibility requirements can be found in the solicitation documents available on Ariba Discovery (https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17566511?extsite=MTc1NjY1MTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
*   If you have any questions, please contact David Barltrop at (SPAC/PSPC) at david.barltrop@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Responsibility for ensuring the completeness and accuracy of the proposal is with the Offeror. It is the Offeror's responsibility to ensure that their proposal is received by the PSPC on or before the closing date. Late proposals will be declared non-responsive and will not be considered for this opportunity. We look forward to reviewing your proposal.
